resources.string: Either the origin or the destination is missing
The origin and the destination must not be the same station
And where are you travelling to?
How many bus and/or tram journeys?
Bus and/or tram journeys made within one hour are considered as one

If your bus and/or tram journeys are all within the space of an hour, you should consider them as a single journey because you will only be charged once.\n\nExample: you catch a bus and tap your card at 10:00, then you catch a tram and tap at 10:30 and then another bus at 10:59. You will only be charged for the time you tapped at 10:00.

Let\'s make sure you\'re happy with the way your data is handled.\n\nYou can always change it later if you want.
